properties.entry: SELECT DISTINCT COMPANY_NAME, C.COMPANY_ADDRESS, COMPANY_PICTURE FROM COMPANY C JOIN RESERVE USING(COMPANY_NAME) WHERE (COMPANY_NAME LIKE '%?%' OR C.COMPANY_ADDRESS LIKE '%?%') AND (CHECKIN NOT BETWEEN '?' AND '?' AND CHECKOUT NOT BETWEEN '?' AND '?')
SELECT RESERVE_NUM , CHECKIN , CHECKOUT , COMPANY_NAME , COMPANY_ADDRESS FROM RESERVE WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
